title: CHICKEN CAESAR SALAD WITH COTIJA
directions: Season chicken with salt and pepper, then grill over medium-high heat until done, approximately 10-15 minutes. Cut into 1 strips and set aside.

In a blender or food processor, combine 1/3 cup of Queso Fresco, cilantro, garlic, ¼ cup green onions, lime juice, vinegar and hot sauce. With motor running, slowly add oil until incorporated and season to taste. Blend 30 seconds more.
In a medium-sized skillet over medium heat, carefully place Cotija cheese cubes in pan and brown on all sides. Drain on paper towel.
In a large bowl, toss chicken, lettuce, dressing and Cotija cubes. Transfer to plates and garnish with remaining green onions and Queso Fresco. Serve immediately.
